_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Quilt
author: kevin@kevinpatino.com
description: The Quilt project is an open-source, community-driven modding toolchain designed primarily for Minecraft. By focusing on speed, ease of use and modularity, Quilt aims to provide a sleek and modern modding toolchain with an open ecosystem.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Quilt MC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq unzip dos2unix wget
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Enable snapshots
if [ -z "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" ] || [ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/game | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable== true )|.version' | head -n1)
elif [ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" == "snapshot" ]; then
  MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/game | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable== false )|.version' | head -n1)
fi

if [ -z "$QUILT_VERSION" ] || [ "$QUILT_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  QUILT_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/installer | jq -r '.[0].version')
fi

if [ -z "$LOADER_VERSION" ] || [ "$LOADER_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  LOADER_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/loader | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable== true )|.version' | head -n1)
elif [ "$LOADER_VERSION" == "snapshot" ]; then
  LOADER_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.quiltmc.org/v3/versions/loader | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable== false )|.version' | head -n1)
fi

wget -O quilt-installer.jar https://maven.quiltmc.org/repository/release/org/quiltmc/quilt-installer/$QUILT_VERSION/quilt-installer-$QUILT_VERSION.jar
java -jar quilt-installer.jar install server $MINECRAFT_VERSION $LOADER_VERSION --download-server --install-dir=/mnt/server
echo -e "Install Complete"

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jar file to run the server with.

variables.name: Quilt Version
variables.description: The version of Quilt to install.

variables.name: Quilt Loader Version
variables.description: The version of Quilt Loader to install.

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of Minecraft to install. Use "latest" to install the latest version, or use "snapshot" to install the latest snapshot.
